Title: Relates to improper practices relating to staff membership or professional privileges of a physician and such physician's board certification
Summary: Relates to improper practices relating to staff membership or professional privileges of a physician and such physician's board certification.
LawCode: Amd §§2801-b & 4406-d, Pub Health L; amd §4803, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to improper practices relating to staff membership or professional privileges of a physician and board certification
